page.title: 09Living in Woolley Moor
page.content:
We asked people what they thought about living in a small village like Woolley Moor.
{Attractions: peaceful village friendly people have always lived here rural area clean air enjoy country life convenient for work {Changes noted in village: reservoir shop closed Post Office closed less young families and children {Facilities wanted in village:} Post Office general store tennis courts bowling green housing for young families playgroup bingo hall phone box on Matlock Road more use made of school for evening classes {
